Translations.Text: yahlifuna bil-lahi lakum liyur'dukum wal-lahu warasuluhu ahaqqu an yur'duhu in kanu mu'minina
alam yaʿlamu annahu man yuhadidi l-laha warasulahu fa-anna lahu nara jahannama khalidan fiha dhalika l-khiz'yu l-ʿazimu
yahdharu l-munafiquna an tunazzala ʿalayhim suratun tunabbi-uhum bima fi qulubihim quli is'tahziu inna l-laha mukh'rijun ma tahdharuna
wala-in sa-altahum layaqulunna innama kunna nakhudu wanalʿabu qul abil-lahi waayatihi warasulihi kuntum tastahziuna
la taʿtadhiru qad kafartum baʿda imanikum in naʿfu ʿan taifatin minkum nuʿadhib taifatan bi-annahum kanu muj'rimina
al-munafiquna wal-munafiqatu baʿduhum min baʿdin yamuruna bil-munkari wayanhawna ʿani l-maʿrufi wayaqbiduna aydiyahum nasu l-laha fanasiyahum inna l-munafiqina humu l-fasiquna
waʿada l-lahu l-munafiqina wal-munafiqati wal-kufara nara jahannama khalidina fiha hiya hasbuhum walaʿanahumu l-lahu walahum ʿadhabun muqimun
